text:
## How to check my team members’ learning performance?

Andy is a department manager of an organisation and he wants to check who have
not passed the compulsory course "Certified Quality Engineer" in his
department. Let’s see how Andy will check his team members’ learning
performance.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks **My team** on the left navigation pane.

2\. On the **My team** page, he can view all the courses in which his team
members are enrolled.

3\. He clicks the Filters button and selects course name as "Certified Quality
Engineer", final grade as "Failed" and "N/A" and assigned or self-enrolled as
"Assigned".

4\. Once the filter selection is complete, Andy clicks **Apply**. Then he can
view the team members in his department who have not passed the course.

5\. He can also click **Export** to export the learning performance report to
an Excel file.
